DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find take calcium vitamin D supplement , follow low-calorie diet , help people lose weight .
DOC.brief_title: Calcium Supplementation Healthy Weight-Lite ( CaSHeW Lite )
DOC.detailed_description: Recent study suggest calcium may important weight loss , study result . The purpose study find take calcium vitamin D supplement , follow low-calorie diet , help people lose weight . We use special orange juice less calorie regular orange juice . Half subject study drink study juice ( reduced-calorie orange juice ) contain extra calcium vitamin D. The subject drink reduced-calorie orange juice without extra calcium vitamin D . Comparisons : We compare subject follow diet take calcium vitamin D supplement follow diet .
DOC.criteria: Men woman , 18 65 year age , capable providing inform consent . BMI 25 35 kg/m2 . Nonsmoker ( least 6 month ) . In good health , determine principal investigator base medical history physical examination . Clinical laboratory evaluation ( include Biochemistry , Hematology , Endocrinology ) within reference range test laboratory , unless deem clinically significant Investigator . Because calorierestricted diet radiation exposure CT scan , female nonpregnant , nonlactating , either postmenopausal least 1 year , surgically sterile least 3 month , willing use approve method contraception ( may include use abstinence ; intrauterine device ; female condom spermicide ; diaphragm spermicide ; cervical cap spermicide ; oral transdermal hormonal contraceptive ; condom spermicide sexual partner ; sterile sexual partner ) 35 day prior study entry ( i.e. , Day 1 ) 30 day follow Study Completion . For female , pregnancy test result must negative screen visit visit CT scan do . Ability comprehend willingness sign Informed Consent Form study . Ability comply study restriction regard diet exercise . Stable weight ( + 5 % ) least 3 month prior study entry . Diabetes mellitus . History clinical manifestation significant metabolic , hepatic , renal , hematological , pulmonary , cardiovascular , gastrointestinal , urological , neurological , psychiatric disorder opinion investigator would expect interfere study increase risk subject . Participation investigational diet study within 90 day prior study entry . History medical psychological condition social circumstance would impair subject 's ability participate reliably study . Use within last six month medication result significant weight gain weight loss , include antipsychotic , selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor , antiepileptic drug , appetitesuppressants phentermine sibutramine , lipaseinhibitor orlistat . ( see Appendix 1 detailed list ) Active eat disorder . History alcoholism substance abuse within 5 year prior study entry . Recommendation physician avoid calcium supplement history kidney stone medical condition . History hyperparathyroidism sarcoidosis . Osteoporosis medical condition physician recommend take multivitamin calcium supplementation . High calcium intake ( 2 serving dairy product per day take calcium supplement > 3x/wk ) 1 month prior study start date duration study . ( If participant take calcium supplement > 3x/wk 2 serving dairy product per day , eligible participate agree stop 1 month prior study start date duration study . Participants similarly ask stop multivitamin majority supplement contain calcium . ) General medical condition wellcontrolled basis exclusion study .
